SEARCH
Package org.eclipse.jdt.core

Interface IModularClassFile

All Superinterfaces:
org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, IClassFile, ICodeAssist, IJavaElement, IOpenable, IParent, ISourceReference, ITypeRoot
public interface IModularClassFile extends IClassFile
Represents the class file of a module description ("module-info.class").
Since:
3.14
Restriction:
This interface is not intended to be implemented by clients.

  • Method Details

    • getModule

      IModuleDescription getModule() throws JavaModelException
      Returns the module description contained in this type root. An error-free IModularClassFile should always have a module.
      Specified by:
      getModule in interface ITypeRoot
      Returns:
      the module description contained in the type root.
      Throws:
      JavaModelException
